name: Debt Crawl
description:
Debt Crawl is a game about living the life of an adventurer. Unfortunately in this world, adventurer training is not cheap! Even the cheapest of schools will cost you much gold!
How are you going to pay this debt? Well, adventure! Collect gold and other loot to sell in town. Use this money to pay back your loan. Unfortunately you'll have to continue this process until you have enough money to retire, or die. Whichever happens first!
